segments.text: The kitchen has this angled view, showing the counter and sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight from the window brightens the scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's drying a plate, completely engrossed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But water's overflowing from the sink uncontrollably.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's drenching the cabinet doors below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't react at all to the wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's perched on that two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's snatching cookies from the jar above.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are splayed, tipping back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move and he'll fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands ready to catch her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her open palm shows her excitement.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks inviting and calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for the potential mess.
segments.speaker: PAR
